extendedInfo.description: Wow (World of Warcraft) Armory is finally available on Android ! Search for your characters in the database, app shows their stats and items.Put a character widget on your home screen.** see blog for release notes **Search for your characters in the database, app shows their stats and items.Put a character widget on your home screen.

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: Might as well get normal WoW armory. This one glitches up and has unwanted, and sometimes offensive and virus adverts. The 3D feature is baggy and shows my cape/shield/head wrong.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good but y\'all need to fix not being able to see gear I all new panda class gear but o.ly can see my character with out his gear please fix other then that very good app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: \303\224k but needs fix
reviews.comment: Seems like it bud be great, shows my right gear but in 3D my char is naked. Maybe models not updated for mop gear\302\241?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Decent app
reviews.comment: A smidge buggy but for the most part a very good app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Eh, no thanks.
reviews.comment: Offers nothing above or beyond the official Warcraft app. 3D model viewer does NOT work for pandaren characters, and is subpar for the races it works with. Waste of space. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 5 to 1
reviews.comment: This app was best when you had the option for guild chat and auction house now its just a mobile wow wiki with a 3D view.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Buggy as hell
reviews.comment: Has multiple bugs when looking up gear n will crash for no reason. Completely disregard the nice mmochamp news on it too, they don\'t actually open. I\'ve spent 20 min trying to get a news article to open n nothing. All in all not worth it, or of a headache n annoyance with what u can\'t access of its features than anything else.
reviews.author: Bazil Borgman

reviews.title: 4 star
reviews.comment: Love the app. Only problem i have is 3D view only loads to blue screen on droid bionic. Other than that i am suggesting this app to all my wow friends.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not so good
reviews.comment: Has bugs that keeps me from seein the armor on the character and even the 3D view of the armor itself. If. That was fixed it would be a great app..
reviews.author: Zach Barker

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: I like the 3d view only issue i noticed is there is some graphical hicups search US arshex it is right around the head i noticed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No pandaren models yet??
reviews.comment: Was 4.5/5 but no support for Pandaren yet..  awesome app :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Droid Razr
reviews.comment: The app is useful but doesn\'t properly show all gear Transmogifications. Great app otherwise : )
reviews.author: Brandon Carter

reviews.title: only english name can be found.
reviews.comment: please fix chinese character issue!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Meh.
reviews.comment: 3d view of character and weapons doesn\'t work. Character shows up with no armor on and the weapons just show a blue screen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Buggy
reviews.comment: Good but buggy need to fix 3d model ui
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t bother downloading
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t show ANY gear except tabard and shirt. It shows ur character bald too. This app is a waste of storage space.
reviews.author: Emily Taylor

reviews.title: So much hate
reviews.comment: The app is wonderful, free, and was released months if not years before blizzard cared about android users. It also has features (like dungeon info) that the official one does not.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Out of date
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Glitched
reviews.comment: It finds my character in 3D with great graphics and detail, however, the app doesn\'t display certain armor correctly.  For example; My heroic Dragon Soul Protection Warrior\'s shield is all white, aswell as his cloak.  And the skin color is wrong.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Out of date but has potential
reviews.comment: Sadly unupdated for MoP but overall approach to the UI has potential. Hope deveopment continues.
reviews.author: A Google User
